title: (x) ultra black sans "Bridging the Directory Gap" - Gotham {Raph}
content:
I tried identifont to no avail. I’m sure this is easy for most of you.  
It looks like a ultra bold but grotesque avenir.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070806212054im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bridging.jpg)

 [‹ "Die Fahne" titles from old black-and-white movie](http://web.archive.org/web/20070806212054/http:/typophile.com/node/19340 "Go to previous forum topic") [Superior Pool Products LLC sans logo ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070806212054/http:/typophile.com/node/19342 "Go to next forum topic")
author: koleslaw

comments.content: I suspected Gotham but for some reason never looked. Thanks!

I did the exact same thing yesterday.  
 [http://typophile.com/node/19313](http://web.archive.org/web/20070806212054/http:/typophile.com/node/19313 "http://typophile.com/node/19313")
